This type of housing can provide accommodation to single person households who cannot or choose not to live in traditional selfcontained housing or HMOs. London Plan Policy H16 provides additional policy requirements and guidance for the development of LSPBSL. 12.76 LSPBSL can play a role in meeting a component of the need for new homes in the borough. Development proposals should be situated in locations which are close to existing services, facilities and public transport.
